R=lambda:list(map(int,input().split()))
n,k,x=R()
a=list(reversed(R()))
print(sum(x if i < k else a[i] for i in range(n)))

n, k, x = map(int, input().split())
print(sum([int(x) for x in input().split()][:n - k]) + k * x)

n, k, x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
print(sum(a[:n - k]) + x * k)

n, k, x = list(map(int, input().split()))
times = list(map(int, input().split()))
for i in range(n - 1, n - k - 1, -1):
    times[i] = x
print(sum(times))

n, k, x = [int(z) for z in input().split()]
dela = [int(z) for z in input().split()]
ans = 0
for i in range(n - k):
    ans += dela[i]
ans += x * k
print(ans)

n,k,x = map(int,input().split())
a = list(map(int,input().split()))
ans = 0
for i in range(n-k): ans += a[i]
ans += k*x
print(ans)

N, K, X = list(map(int, input().split()))

arr = list(map(int, input().split()))

res = sum(arr[0:-K])
res += X * K
print(res)

n, k, x = map(int, input().split())
Time = list(map(int, input().split()))

rez = sum(Time[0:n-k]) + k*x
print(rez)

n, k, x = list(map(int,input().split()))
mas = list(map(int,input().split()))
print(k*x + sum(mas[:-k]) )

n, k, x = map(int, input().split())
k = min(k, n)
print(sum([int(s) for s in input().split()][:-k]) + k * x)

n, k, x = map(int, input().split())

ts = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

for i in range(n-1, n-k-1, -1):
    ts[i] = min(ts[i], x)

print(sum(ts))

y=input().split()
n = int(y[0])
k=int(y[1])
x=int(y[2])
a=[]
s=0
a=input().split()
for i in range(len(a)-k):
    s+=int(a[i])
s+=k*x
print(s)

n, k, x = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
nums = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

partial_sum = 0
for i in range(n - k):
    partial_sum += nums[i]

print(partial_sum + k * x)

n, k, x = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
res = 0
for i in range(n - k):
	res += a[i]
print(res+ k * x)

nkx = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
ai = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
k = nkx[1]
x = nkx[2]
ai = ai[:-k] + [x]*k
print(sum(ai))

n,k,x=map(int,input().split())
nums=list(map(int,input().split()))
for i in range(k):
  nums[n-i-1]=x
print(sum(nums))

R=lambda:list(map(int,input().split()))
n,k,x=R()
a=list(R())

n,k,x=list(map(int,input().split()))
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
a.sort()
a.reverse()
br=0
for i in range(n):
       if i+1<=k:
                   br=br+x
       else:
                   br=br+a[i]
print(br)

n,k,x = map(int, input().split())
time = list(map(int, input().split()))
sum = 0
for i in range(n-k):
    sum = time[i] + sum

total = sum + k*x
print(total)

N,K,X = map(int,input().split())
lst = sorted([int(i) for i in input().split()])

for i in range(1,K+1):
    lst[-i] = X
print(sum(lst))

n=input()
xx=n.split()
y=input()
yy=y.split()
su=0
for i in range(0,int(xx[0])-int(xx[1])):
    su+=int(yy[i])
su+=int(xx[1])*int(xx[2])
print(su)
